}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{Notice |image=Stop hand nuvola.png |heading=NOTE: |please check NVRAM first (64KB (default at release) or 128KB (update by Asus)) It needs stock firmware V3.0.0.4.382.51374 before tomato to get 128KB NVRAM }} :{{â€¢}} [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/06/rt-ac3200-ultimate-802-11ac-6x6-router-computex-2014/ PR on ''Asus PC DIY''] BCM43602 is supported in the mainline ''Linux'' kernel by [[brcmfmac]]. {{see also|ASUS_RT-AC5300|Arcadyan}} {{WiFiCert|WFA57362|12/04/2014}} ===Specifications=== :per [[ASUS]] [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC3200/ product page] + elsewhere * '''Product class''': ''AC3200'' (600Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 2x 1300Mbps [5 GHz]) :600Mbps data rates on the 2.4GHz radio require ''nqam'' (256-QAM) * '''Antenna''': 6x external dipole antenna w/ ''RP-SMA'' connector * '''Ports''': Ethernet (10/100/1000 Base-T) : '''WAN''': 1x ''GbE'' (RJ45), '''LAN''': 4x ''GbE'' (RJ45) : '''USB''': 1x ''USB 2.0'', 1x ''USB 3.0'' * '''Vendor firmware features''': ''AiCloud'', USB file/printer/scanner sharing, :''ASUSWRT'' interface, ''Adaptive QoS'', [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32485-asus-rt-ac87u-dual-band-wireless-ac2400-gigabit-router-first-look?start=2 ''AiProtection''], ''Media Station'', :''SmartSync'' (file syncing w/ ''Dropbox'', ''FTP'', [https://www.asuswebstorage.com ''WebStorage''] support), : ''AiRadar'' (beamforming) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32625-asus-rt-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-ac3200-gigabit-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :"RT-AC3200 REV 2.34" is silkscreened on the main board. * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/201-asus-rt-ac3200.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) :"RT-AC3200 REV 4.12", "HannStar KMV-4" and "1513" (04/2015) :is silkscreened on the main board; PSU: 19 V, 2.37/3.42 A * [http://www.cnet.com/products/asus-rt-ac3200-tri-band-wireless-gigabit-router/ On '''C|Net'''] * [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac3200.shtml On '''iXBT'''] (RU) * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/asus/asus-rt-ac3200-r196/ On '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/forums/showthread.php?t=18697 ''Share What You Know: ASUS RT-AC3200'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] * [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33239-Asus-RT-AC3200-Wireless-Router ''Asus RT-AC3200 Wireless Router'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=2403 ''Asus RT-AC3200 Wireless Router'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (images PCB) ===News=== * [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/06/rt-ac3200-ultimate-802-11ac-6x6-router-computex-2014/ ''RT-AC3200 - 6 Antenna 802.11AC Router - Computex 2014''
on '''Asus PC DYI'''] - (Initial specification dump on 2014-06-02) * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32429-ac3200-routers-by-july ''AC3200 Routers By July?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32395-ac3200-routers-coming-this-fall ''AC3200 Routers Coming This Fall?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s840231 ''Broadcom Doubles Wi-Fi Speed of Devices with First Six Stream
802.11ac MIMO Platform'' on '''Broadcom'''] (press release) :Announces the ''XStream'' platform (which seems to be BCM4709 + 3x BCM43602), :which is touted as ''Penta Core'' (each BCM43602 radio embeds a small processor :to allow for FullMAC operation, BCM4709 remains same dual-core Cortex A9 SoC) * [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 ''Broadcom BCM4709 (1GHz dual-core Cortex A9 SoC)'' on '''Product page'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom Launches Enhanced 5G WiFi Video Streaming for the Home''
on '''Broadcom'''] (press release) - (Broadcom BCM43602 802.11ac PCIe SoC) * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/32451-mu-mimo-vs-xstream-the-coming-battle-for-wi-fi-airtime?showall=&start=1 ''MU-MIMO vs. XStream: The Coming Battle For Wi-Fi Airtime
- Another Approach, The Choice'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :The block diagram shown @ ''SNB'' indicates each BCM43602 includes :its own @ 320MHz ''Cortex R4'' processor (along with 940 KB RAM). * [http://www.revolutionwifi.net/revolutionwifi/2014/04/impact-of-fcc-5-ghz-u-nii-report-order.html ''Impact of the FCC 5 GHz U-NII Report & Order on Wi-Fi Networks''
on '''Revolution Wi-Fi'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== *https://forum.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=1151140 *https://netosec.com/dd-wrt-wifi-vlans (other usful info too) ===Flashing Tomato=== ====Flashing FreshTomato ARM7 2019.4==== Upload via [https://www.asus.com/support/FAQ/1000814/ firmware restoration utility], after it seems like endless reboot. wait for lan lights to flash twice, the do a [[Project:DD-WRT/Hard reset or 30/30/30|30-30-30 reset]] using WPS button as reset button. Using the actual reset button for a 30-30-30 will put it in recovery mode. ==Pictures==
'''from SmallNetBuilder''' File:Asus_RT-AC3200_top.jpg|Top File:Asus_RT-AC3200_inside.jpg|Inside File:Asus_RT-AC3200_board.jpg|Board top
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== When using WINscp change the file protocol from SFTP to SCP to connect. ===Recovery/Rescue Mode=== Set up the Router Rescue Mode Take [RT-AC68U] as an example Unplug the router's power cord. Press the Reset button. Keep long pressing the Reset button and plug the cord to DC IN at the same time. Notice: Please DO NOT release the Reset button until the Rescue Mode is enabled. The router turns to the Rescue mode when you see the power indicator light is slowly flashing. ==See also== :[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[ASUS RT-AC5300]] *ASUS RT-AC3200 *[[ASUS RT-AC3100]] *[[ASUS RT-AC2900]] *[[ASUS RT-AC1900]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
